content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, let's negotiate the rental price. I am looking for the highest possible price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to rent the apartment at the lowest price possible. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
